name: Robot Invasion-Lone Sniper 3D
description:
Sniper Game 18 - Robot shooting is the latest FPS game that will blow you away. As we are living in the technology era that’s why enemies has attacked on you with robots. You are the last hope, so show your shooting skills and vanish all the robots before they attack on your people. Don’t mercy on them; pull your trigger , aim them and shoot them. You are the last commando and all peoples are depending on you. As real commando shooter you have aggressive and accurate shooting techniques, use them all to finish the entire terror and complete your challenging levels.

Features:
- Very smooth and easy control of sniper guns
- Immersive audio
- Addictive and Challenging missions
- Stunning 3d graphics
- Ultimate Guns
